decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly deploying cheap artifacts while utilizing cards like Thoughtcast to draw more cards and maintain a steady flow of threats. The synergy between cards like Mox Opal, Mishra's Bauble, and Urza's Saga allows for fast mana acceleration and efficient creature deployment. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Pithing Needle and Engineered Explosives to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of artifacts and aggressive creatures in a fast and efficient manner.

This Modern Aggro - Affinity deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts and using them to power up creatures like Kappa Cannoneer and Pinnacle Emissary. The deck also includes cards like Cranial Plating and Shadowspear to give these creatures additional strength. Metallic Rebuke and Engineered Explosives provide disruption and removal options, while Tormod's Crypt offers graveyard hate. Urza's Saga is included as a versatile land that can help search for key artifacts. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast plays and efficient artifact synergies.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying aggressive pressure through creatures such as Flickerwisp and Emperor of Bones. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Ephemerate to control the board and maintain tempo. The key strategy is to leverage the synergy between creature removal spells like Fatal Push and powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Overlord of the Balemurk. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler to further disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the board.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage to outvalue opponents. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi and Narset to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Solitude and Subtlety provides additional removal options, while Isochron Scepter allows for repeatable spell casting. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and maximize consistency. Overall, the deck aims to grind out opponents and win through attrition and resource management.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells while also utilizing Leylines to control the board. Ragavan and Territorial Kavu provide early pressure, while Phlage and Scion of Draco offer powerful late-game threats. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact help protect your creatures and maintain board presence. Lightning Bolt and Consign to Memory provide additional direct damage options. Stubborn Denial offers protection against removal spells, and Doorkeeper Thrull can deal with opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and control the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing creatures with powerful enchantment abilities to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The key strategy involves flickering creatures with cards like Ephemerate and Solitude to generate value and protect your own board. Additionally, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's resources with cards like Sanctifier en-Vec and Guide of Souls, while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Ocelot Pride and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. The deck also utilizes graveyard recursion with cards like Starfield Shepherd to maintain a consistent presence on the battlefield.

The deck revolves around utilizing a combination of control spells and powerful creatures to dominate the game. Spells like Spell Snare, No More Lies, and Wrath of the Skies help control the board while Ephemerate and Snapcaster Mage provide card advantage. Creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Thundertrap Trainer offer efficient threats, while Quantum Riddler disrupts the opponent's plan. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements, with a mix of fetch lands and shock lands. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and control the game until victory.

The main concept of this deck is to use cost reduction cards such as Manamorphose and Ruby Medallion to quickly generate mana, while using Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible to draw cards and find combo pieces. The goal is to cast spells like Artist's Talent and Grapeshot multiple times in a turn to deal lethal damage to the opponent. Past in Flames allows for spells to be recast from the graveyard, while Wish provides versatility in finding necessary cards. The deck aims to win quickly and efficiently through a carefully planned combo sequence.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Consult the Star Charts to draw cards and filter through the deck. It also includes a mix of counterspells like Spell Snare and Force of Negation to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to out value the opponent by controlling the board and hand, while setting up win conditions like Teferi, Time Raveler and Supreme Verdict to secure victory.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Murktide Regent while disrupting opponents with counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Snare. Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat provide efficient removal, while Consign to Memory offers some additional utility. The deck also utilizes cantrips like Preordain and Expressive Iteration to ensure it maintains a consistent stream of threats and answers. With a mix of aggression and control elements, this deck aims to pressure opponents while keeping their own board state safe and secure.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes a variety of mana sources to cast powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide additional support to control the board. Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu offer early aggression while Stubborn Denial helps protect key threats. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while using cards like Consign to Memory for removal and disruption.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast aggressive plays with a mix of creatures and burn spells to quickly defeat opponents. The deck includes efficient creatures such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, along with powerful support cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Goblin Bombardment. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Static Prison helps disrupt opponents' strategies while cards like Seasoned Pyromancer provide card advantage. Overall, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game as quickly as possible.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful support cards. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to apply pressure early on, while also utilizing powerful spells like Goblin Bombardment and Thraben Charm to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury also allows for explosive plays and potential game-ending combos. Ultimately, the goal is to maintain aggression and momentum throughout the game to secure a quick victory.

The deck revolves around assembling Jeskai Ascendancy and using it in conjunction with various artifacts and legendary creatures to generate a powerful combo engine. By untapping creatures and generating mana, the deck aims to create a loop of triggers that allows it to draw cards, dig for combo pieces, and disrupt opponent's strategies. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student play crucial roles in enabling the combo, while cards like Metallic Rebuke and Portable Hole provide disruption and protection. The deck seeks to efficiently chain spells and activate abilities to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes cards that allow for card selection and manipulation to keep the aggression going. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with fast creatures and direct damage spells, keeping the pressure high and finishing the game before the opponent can stabilize. The deck aims to win the game quickly through efficient use of its resources and fast-paced gameplay.

The deck aims to quickly assemble the Amulet of Vigor combo with Primeval Titan, using cards like Gruul Turf, Simic Growth Chamber, and Lotus Field to generate extra mana and gain additional land drops. The deck also includes cards like Scapeshift and Malevolent Rumble to search for key pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. By efficiently ramping and tutoring for powerful lands, the deck can overwhelm the opponent with massive threats and close out games quickly.
